adDetails: I would love to speak to you about your needs and desires. Each person is unique and presents his/her own history. I have discovered that many people, children or adults, who are having trouble academically, are having trouble emotionally. That is why I value my skills as both a counselor, life coach, and a tutor. I specialize in control issues plaguing your forward momentum! Please contact Cotton at show contact info or visit us at: www.heresyourcounselor.com
